description:
Haru assumed he had the only App Drive in the world, but then he sees one fall out of newcomer idol Karan Eri`s bag! They go to the TV studio to find out the truth, but security is strict! What`s the plan, Haru?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Bang Punch Straight to Your Heart! Eri`s an Appmon Idol!
Anata no Heart ni Dokkan Punch! Eri wa Apumon Idol!
あなたのハートにドッカンパンチ! エリはアプモンアイドル!
